title: Frequently disconnecting for 5-10 seconds in game.
body:
Ever since the most recent patch I am having this problem where my champion freezes for about 5-10 seconds consistently. I can see everything happen to my champion but I just cant move. Its been over a week now and I do not know what to do.  The game is virtually unplayable. The strange thing is that my wifi is working fine. No one else in the house has any problems so I cant determine where the problem lies. Is it something wrong with my laptop, wifi or league? One other thing i should add is that about at the same time this started happening we had a gues arrive in our house and connect her devices to the wifi which strangely causes my phone to disconnect until I reboot the motem. I originally thought this was the problem but I tried blocking all other devices from the wifi  and running league and still had the problem. I am really not a tech guy so if anyone can help me find the problem that would be great.
Thanks

replies.body:
The symptoms you're describing are pretty common of *Packet Loss* or *High Packet Buffering*. This is most commonly caused by local issues on your network, but has also been caused by routing issues to the servers. I'd like you to work through the steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local stuff looks good.

Let me know if those steps helped!
